channel.title: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong
channel.description: It's insignificant really, but the rooms shown in the class cards for unseen converts (Alcoholic, Aristocrat, etc.) show their default BD rooms instead of the spoopy unseen meeting table.

item.title: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Yeah, I remember Boslof said something about having to take photos of every room so people stop “finding ways to not play the game”.

Read full topic
item.source: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong

item.title: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I mean, it might be an oversight but I believe the devs obviously take a dim view to this sort of metagaming so it would make sense to have a picture of the original rooms visible so it can easily be described.

Read full topic
item.source: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong

item.title: [Small Bug] Unseen convert rooms in class cards are wrong
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
That makes sense. I’m not allowed to delete the topic though D:
